gravity.name: Black Hole
gravity.description: Place a black hole near you that will drag the others into it

boomerang.name: Dagger
boomerang.description: Hit them with a close range shot

effects.title: Interruptible
effects.text: The halos and speed boost will be cancelled if you are hit, or if you cast another spell.

rouge.name: Rouge
rouge.description: Choose the Rouge Class : Quick, small, but takes more damage

throwdag.name: Throwing Dagger
throwdag.description: Quick cooldown and packs a punch. Good old trusty fireball.

bossball.name: Helix Launcher
bossball.description: A strong projectile for a strong boss

knight.name: knight's armor
knight.description: Passive ability. Disrupt incoming attacks, reducing their effectiveness.

effects.title: Resistant
effects.text: Reduce damage received by 15%. Applies to all forms of damage, including void damage.

rouge2.name: hardcore Rouge
rouge2.description: Choose the Hardcore Rouge Class : Quicker, smaller, but takes much more damage

sword.name: Sword In the stone
sword.description: For 1 second, swing your lightsaber to deflect projectiles and knockback enemies!

sight.name: Flash Bomb
sight.description: Vanish from sight for 2.5 seconds, and also increase movement speed 70%.

mace.description: A delayed explosion to knock back your enemies. Knockback is higher at the center of the blast.

revolver.description: Quick cooldown and packs a punch. Good old trusty fireball.

grenade.description: A delayed explosion to knock back your enemies. Knockback is higher at the center of the blast.

gunslinger.description: Passive ability. Your superior talents allow you to attack with increased effectiveness.

fan.name: Fan The Hammer
fan.description: Quick cooldown and packs a punch. Good old trusty fireball.

harmor.name: Heavy armor
harmor.description: Passive ability. Disrupt incoming attacks, reducing their effectiveness.

effects.title: Resistant
effects.text: Reduce damage received by 15%. Applies to all forms of damage, including void damage.
